remaining round s round s st s stitch es notes this hat is worked in the round from the bottom up beginning with a ribbed brim it s a dense knit for added warmth it is designed for an average adult head with a slouchy fit if a less slouchy fit is desired knit less in the plain stockinette portion after the chart and before the beginning of the crown decrease if more slouch is desired knit more in that section if more slouch is added more mc will be needed almost every bit of yarn for the mc was used if gauge is off that will affect yarn amounts and fit © 2023 tanis gray www tanisknits com
